columns.Country_ID: The unique identifier for each country.
columns.Name: The official name of the country.
columns.Population: The total number of residents in the country.
columns.Area: The total land area of the country in square units.
columns.Languages: The primary languages spoken in the country.

country.table_description: The table stores essential information about countries.

columns.Roller_Coaster_ID: The unique identifier for each roller coaster.
columns.Name: The name of the roller coaster.
columns.Park: The amusement park where the roller coaster is located.
columns.Country_ID: The unique identifier for the country of the amusement park.
columns.Length: The total length of the roller coaster in feet.
columns.Height: The maximum height of the roller coaster in feet.
columns.Speed: The maximum speed of the roller coaster in miles per hour.
columns.Opened: The date when the roller coaster was opened to the public.
columns.Status: The operational status of the roller coaster.

roller_coaster.table_description: The table stores details about roller coasters and their features.
